folder: Morningstar Road & Dixon Avenue, Staten Island, NY
text:
(1)
397 Morningstar Road, east side, between Dixon Avenue and Becks Lane. This house belonged to Solon Buffum (1874-1898) and
C. T. Murphy (1907-1917). The view is a)uth. May 4, 1932
P. L. Sperr
(2)
A view from the grounds.
May 4, 1932
P. L. Sperr

folder: Dixon Avenue & Morningstar Road, Staten Island, NY
text:
(1)
397 Morningstar Road, east side, between Dixon Avenue and Becks Lane. This house belonged to Solon Buffunh (1874-1898) and
C. T. Murphy (1907-1917). The view is north.
May 17, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.
(2)
The same, another view. The point of vantage is Dixon Avenue.
May 17, 1938.
P. L. Sperr.
